about_the_game:
At night, in the familiar alleyways, a new bistro has opened. Amidst the busy work, the passing pedestrians create a lively atmosphere. Accidentally, the customer who entered the store started the daily business in the bistro.

The player be a store manager and runs a bistro. He could design the daily menu, hire the excellent partners, develop amazing food after finding high quality ingredients and create the perfect marriage between the wine and food. At the final, let the bistro become one of the famous restaurant in the world.

Operating a Bistro, Create your own ideal restaurant.

Through menu design, recruiting partners, and dishes development, create an ideal and comfortable dining and wine environment.

Daily quest, earn additional bonus rewards by achieving extra goals.

There will be new daily challenges. Completing it will earn additional rewards, and obtaining more resources.

Presentation of achievements, check the contents of the results after the operation.

Display the results after each business operation, adjust strategies as needed, and meet the demands of more customers who visit the bistro.
